content:
ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs Class

Definition

Used in conjunction with signaling the ResolveProgressChanged event. It is signaled whenever a PeerNameRecord object is found in response to a stem.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync* operation on a specific PeerName.

In this Article

public class ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs : System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs
Inheritance
Object
EventArgs
ProgressChangedEventArgs
ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs

Inherited Members

ProgressPercentage
UserState
Empty
Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Remarks

If multiple peer name record objects exist in the cloud(s) being queried, this event is signaled once for each record object found. The ResolveCompleted event is raised only once when all endpoints have been found.

Normal process completion implies that either the Resolver object has reached the end of the cloud(s) to query for peer names, or it has reached the maximum number of record entries for the peer name record collection it is constructing.

All references to this instance of the Resolver are coordinated with the token userState Object, which is a unique identifier for this asynchronous resolve request.

Constructors

ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs(PeerNameRecord, Object)

Initializes a new instance of the ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs class.

public ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs (System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord peerNameRecord, object userToken);
Parameters
peerNameRecord
PeerNameRecord

The PeerNameRecord object to be found.

userToken
Object

The unique user state object supplied when a stem.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync* operation was started.

Remarks

The resolved peer name is accessible via the PeerName property.

The user state is inherited from AsyncCompletedEventArgs.

Properties

PeerNameRecord

Gets the PeerNameRecord object to resolve.

public System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord PeerNameRecord { get; }
Value
PeerNameRecord

The peer name record object found in response to a stem.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync* operation on a specific stem.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*.

Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is null for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type int.

Remarks

Unsecured peer names can be registered simultaneously by different users in the same Cloud, and associated with different endpoints. Consequently, the PeerNameResolver class is used to resolve peer names to clouds or peer names to peer name records. The event to report progress is raised each time a peer name is found while the Resolver is querying clouds for the PeerName.
